sourcesContent:
Select Players Here

{{playerNum}}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Player} from "../interfaces/Player"; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', }) export class HomeComponent { players$!: Observable; playerNum: number = 1; increment(){ this.playerNum += 1; } decrement(){ if(this.playerNum >1){ this.playerNum -= 1; } } }
